title: Japan Retail Investors Ignore Domestic Bull Market to Opt for US
description: Japan’s retail investors have ignored the equity rally at home and have placed their faith in overseas stocks.
content: Japan’s retail investors have ignored the equity rally at home and have placed their faith in overseas stocks.
